files.patch:
@@ -1736,0 +1736,1 @@
+        Virtual threads that are currently suspended do not change state.
@@ -1740,1 +1741,0 @@
-        Virtual threads that are currently suspended do not change state.
@@ -1864,4 +1864,0 @@
-        Virtual threads may be resumed with
-        <functionlink id="ResumeAllVirtualThreads"></functionlink> or
-        <functionlink id="ResumeThreadList"></functionlink> or
-        <functionlink id="ResumeThread"></functionlink>.
@@ -1869,0 +1865,4 @@
+        Virtual threads may be suspended with
+        <functionlink id="SuspendAllVirtualThreads"></functionlink> or
+        <functionlink id="SuspendThreadList"></functionlink> or
+        <functionlink id="SuspendThread"></functionlink>.

@@ -576,2 +576,2 @@
-      // Update the JavaThread or mounted virtual thread cached value for
-      // thread-specific should_post_on_exceptions value.
+      // The JavaThread for carrier or mounted virtual thread case.
+      // Update the cached value for thread-specific should_post_on_exceptions value.

@@ -122,2 +122,2 @@
-      // Set this as the state for the JavaThread or mounted virtual thread
-      // only if thread_oop is current thread->jvmti_vthread().
+      // The JavaThread for carrier or mounted virtual thread case.
+      // Set this only if thread_oop is current thread->jvmti_vthread().
@@ -217,1 +217,1 @@
-// VTMT cannot be disabled while this counter is positive
+// VTMT cannot be disabled while this counter is positive.
